thread.title: Platinum Partners’ Co-Founder Pleads Guilty to Fraud

author: Corinne Ramey
title: Platinum Partners’ Co-Founder Pleads Guilty to Fraud

organizations.name: platinum partners’ co-founder pleads guilty to fraud

text:
A co-founder of defunct hedge fund Platinum Partners pleaded guilty Friday to a single count of wire-fraud conspiracy in connection with what federal prosecutors had called a bribery-and-kickback scheme.
Murray Huberfeld, 57 years old, was arrested in 2016 and accused of a bribery scheme involving a former New York City union official. He entered the guilty plea in Manhattan federal court.
